# MSBStatsData ![MSBStatsData hex sticker](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mchlbckr/MSBStatsData/main/hexagon.png)

`MSBStatsData` provides curated teaching datasets for statistics and
data science courses at the [Münster School of
Business](https://www.fh-muenster.de/msb/) at [FH
Münster](https://www.fh-muenster.de/).

The package is designed for reproducible exercises and solutions in R,
with data that works well across core topics like frequencies, location
and dispersion measures, association, regression, and introductory time
series analysis.

## Installation

``` r
install.packages("MSBStatsData")

# development version
# install.packages("pak")
# pak::pak("mchlbckr/MSBStatsData")
```

## Quick start

``` r
library(MSBStatsData)

data("cinema_visitors")
head(cinema_visitors)

data("de_energy_prices")
subset(
  de_energy_prices,
  series %in% c("electricity", "transport_fuels")
)[1:6, c("date", "series", "price_index_2015_100")]
```

## Selected datasets

- Core teaching data
  - `cinema_visitors`
  - `bvb_rankings`
  - `website_dwell`
  - `checkout_times`
  - `research_ads`
  - `env_survey_eu10`
- Contingency-table data (aggregated + individual)
  - `union_satisfaction`
  - `union_satisfaction_ind`
  - `sport_occupation`
  - `sport_occupation_ind`
  - `florida_sentencing`
  - `florida_sentencing_ind`
  - `tv_gender`
  - `tv_gender_ind`
  - `car_occupation`
  - `car_occupation_ind`
- Münster mobility data
  - `ms_bike_sites`
  - `ms_bike_hourly_2025`
  - `ms_bike_hourly_2025_city`
- Public statistics snapshots (Germany/NRW)
  - `nrw_population`
  - `de_elections`
  - `de_energy_prices`

## Listing all datasets

``` r
data(package = "MSBStatsData")
```

## Notes

- Most data objects are small and classroom-friendly.
- Where helpful, both aggregated and individual-level versions are
  provided.
- Data sources are documented in the respective dataset help pages
  (`?dataset_name`).
- GitHub releases may be ahead of the current CRAN version.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`bvb_rankings`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/bvb_rankings.md)
  : Borussia Dortmund final rankings (1988-2022)
- [`car_occupation`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/car_occupation.md)
  : Car brand by occupation (aggregated)
- [`car_occupation_ind`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/car_occupation_ind.md)
  : Car brand by occupation (individual-level)
- [`checkout_times`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/checkout_times.md)
  : Checkout service times
- [`cinema_visitors`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/cinema_visitors.md)
  : Cinema visitors over 100 days
- [`de_elections`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/de_elections.md)
  : Bundestag election results by federal state
- [`de_energy_prices`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/de_energy_prices.md)
  : Monthly consumer energy price indices in Germany
- [`decathlon`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/decathlon.md)
  : Data of competition results of decathlon for men
- [`env_survey_eu10`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/env_survey_eu10.md)
  : Environmental survey sample (EU, n = 10)
- [`florida_sentencing`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/florida_sentencing.md)
  : Florida murder sentencing by defendant skin color (aggregated)
- [`florida_sentencing_ind`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/florida_sentencing_ind.md)
  : Florida murder sentencing by defendant skin color (individual-level)
- [`hr_data`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/hr_data.md)
  : HR data
- [`marketing_expenses`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/marketing_expenses.md)
  : Data of Marketing expenses
- [`ms_bike_hourly_2025`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/ms_bike_hourly_2025.md)
  : Hourly bike counts in Muenster by station (2025)
- [`ms_bike_hourly_2025_city`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/ms_bike_hourly_2025_city.md)
  : Hourly citywide bike counts in Muenster (2025)
- [`ms_bike_sites`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/ms_bike_sites.md)
  : Bike counting sites in Muenster
- [`nrw_population`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/nrw_population.md)
  : Population by NRW districts
- [`research_ads`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/research_ads.md)
  : Monthly research and advertising spending
- [`salary_trends`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/salary_trends.md)
  : Salary trend data
- [`shipping_errors`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/shipping_errors.md)
  : Shipping error data
- [`sorting_times`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/sorting_times.md)
  : Sorting times
- [`sport_occupation`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/sport_occupation.md)
  : Sport activity by occupation (aggregated)
- [`sport_occupation_ind`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/sport_occupation_ind.md)
  : Sport activity by occupation (individual-level)
- [`tv_gender`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/tv_gender.md)
  : TV viewing time by gender (aggregated)
- [`tv_gender_ind`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/tv_gender_ind.md)
  : TV viewing time by gender (individual-level)
- [`union_satisfaction`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/union_satisfaction.md)
  : Satisfaction with a union agreement
- [`union_satisfaction_ind`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/union_satisfaction_ind.md)
  : Satisfaction with a union agreement (individual-level)
- [`website_dwell`](https://mchlbckr.github.io/MSBStatsData/reference/website_dwell.md)
  : Grouped website dwell times
